tasks.title: Download EURUSD market data
tasks.description: Download 3 months of EURUSD daily data using yfinance. Save as CSV. Report row count and date range.

tasks.title: Calculate technical indicators
tasks.description: Write a Python script that reads the EURUSD CSV and calculates: SMA(20), SMA(50), RSI(14), MACD. Save results to eurusd_features.csv.

tasks.title: Design SMA crossover strategy
tasks.description: Write a trading strategy document: entry when SMA20 crosses above SMA50, exit when crosses below. Define position sizing (1% risk per trade), stop loss (ATR-based), and expected Sharpe ratio. Save as strategy_sma_crossover.py.

tasks.title: Write backtest engine
tasks.description: Write a Python backtest script (backtest_sma.py) that reads eurusd_features.csv and tests the SMA crossover strategy. Output: total trades, win rate, profit factor, max drawdown.

tasks.title: Create system health monitor
tasks.description: Write a health_check.py script that checks: disk space, memory usage, data freshness (last CSV modified time), and number of agent log files. Output a JSON health report.
